titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution authorizing the President to disapprove or reduce an item of appropriations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 1/19/1995--Introduced. Constitutional Amendment - Grants the President the authority to reduce or disapprove any item of appropriation in any Act or joint resolution, except any item of appropriation for the legislative branch.
